title: Most popular Canadian product categories purchased by consumers in Canada 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest value at Response Food is 2.56x times more than the lowest value at Wine.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest value at Response Food is 2.56x times more than the lowest value at Wine.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Food has the highest Share of respondents and Wine has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Beer has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 53.0 between the maximum Response Food and minimum Response Wine.
The Response Food has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Beer, and Clothing. Down to the Response Wine which is the lowest.
The lowest value 34.0 at Wine is almost 1.74 times smaller than the average value 50.0.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 250.0.
